children.name: Active Countermeasures
children.description: The best defense is a good offense.

children.name: Interlinked Support Systems
children.description: Arrays of defensive armaments prove much more effective than independent countermeasures.

children.name: Predictive Algorithms
children.description: Advanced prediction greatly increases the accuracy of active countermeasure systems.

children.name: Scientific Method
children.description: Testable predictions of observable phenomena.

children.name: Administrative AI
children.description: Organizational circuitry rerouting academic fervor.

children.name: Specialized Combat Computers
children.description: Active matrices tuned for specific combat-centric tasks greatly improve engagement efficiency.

children.name: Auxiliary Fire-control
children.description: By installing an auxiliary fire-control system our ships can afford to make more advanced calculations, increasing accuracy.

children.name: Extended Combat Algorithms
children.description: Further advances in predictive algorithms allow for augmented tactical decision-making in the field.

children.name: Sapient Combat Simulations
children.description: Running sapient AIs through high-intensity combat simulations yields valuable insight into potential optimizations for risk-evaluation techniques.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk

• Has Technology: §YSapient Combat Simulations§!

• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_maniacal£ §cHyper Focus §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_maniacal_2£ §cHyper Focus 2§!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_maniacal_3£ §cHyper Focus 3§!

children.name: Autonomous Ship Intellects
children.description: Granting our ships their own semi-autonomous intellect will greatly enhance their responsiveness in combat.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk

• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_maniacal£ §cHyper Focus §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_maniacal_2£ §cHyper Focus 2§!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_maniacal_3£ §cHyper Focus 3§!

children.name: AI-Controlled Colony Ships
children.description: By giving control of the colony ship to an Artificial Intelligence, the crew and colonists can be placed in suspended animation.

children.name: Self-Aware Colony Ships
children.description: Sufficiently advanced systems are capable of optimizing themselves if they are made acutely aware of the purpose for which they were made.

children.name: Market Analysis Algorithms
children.description: Basic administrative AIs can be used to streamline supply and demand lines, reducing waste.

children.name: Predictive Consumerism
children.description: Using advanced AIs, we can reliably predict consumer demand before it exists.

children.name: Self-Evolving Logic
children.description: Introspective prioritization.

children.name: Positronic Implants
children.description: Expanding possibilities through the application of limited cybernetics.

children.name: Positronic AI
children.description: Evolving artificial intellects are opening the door to the possibility for true synthetic sapience.

children.name: Synchronized Defenses
children.description: Aligning defensive and offensive weapon execution paradigms allows for increased efficiency.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YSynchronized Defenses§!

×0.5 All must be false
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_expertise_computing£ §cExpertise: Computing §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_curator£ §cCurator §!

children.name: Exotic Materials Labs
children.description: As we explore the galaxy, we continually encounter new materials and substances that are unfamiliar to us. Cataloging and analyzing these discoveries will require new facilities.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• Has Technology: §YExotic Gas Extraction§!
• Has Technology: §YExotic Gas Refining§!
• has_country_flag=has_market_access

children.name: Interplanetary Research Initiative
children.description: A bid for interplanetary resource pools and more flexible research grants.
weight_modifiers:
×0.25 All must be false
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_expertise_computing£ §cExpertise: Computing §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_curator£ §cCurator §!

children.name: Quantum Neuro-Links
children.description: Advanced neurological implants with connection to quantum computing clusters allow for multi-threaded thoughts.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be true

• has_utopia=yes

children.name: Multi-Dimensional Studies
children.description: To expand our knowledge base, we must consider all levels of existence. A new realm of science awaits us!

children.name: Zero-G Laboratories
children.description: A lot of critical research can only be done in a zero gravity environment, which these specialized laboratories are eminently designed for.

children.name: Miniature Containment Fields
children.description: Containment force fields are excellent for isolating and holding various substances or specimens so they can be analyzed in detail.

children.name: Quantum Probes
children.description: Advanced probes that can thoroughly analyze subjects on a sub-atomic level, generating a wealth of valuable research data.

children.name: Autonomous Station Protocols
children.description: Increased automation of station functions will free up more staff for research duties.

children.name: Multi-Dimensional Analysis
children.description: Studying something from the limited perspective of a single dimensional reality does not paint the whole picture. Every angle must be considered.

children.name: Automated Exploration Protocols
children.description: An advanced AI will aid science officers in their task to explore strange new worlds, to seek out new life and new civilizations, to boldly go where no Blorg has gone before. The Science Ship will be able to explore the galaxy with help from an AI.
weight_modifiers: ×0.0 Game year is before £time£ 2205

×2.0 All must be true
• is_ai=no
• Game year is after £time£ 2210

×2.0 All must be true
• is_ai=no
• Game year is after £time£ 2215

×2.0 All must be true
• is_ai=no
• Game year is after £time£ 2220

children.name: Gravitic Sensors
children.description: These sensors have been tuned to look for any gravitational changes in space, such as those produced by the presence of a starship.

children.name: Detection Array
children.description: A high-powered suite of external sensors, capable of detecting cloaked fleets.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YDetection Array§!

children.name: Advanced Detection Algorithms
children.description: Coupling detection arrays with the computers onboard our science vessels can vastly increase their scanning resolution.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YAdvanced Detection Algorithms§!

children.name: Dark Matter Detection
children.description: Dark matter resonance chambers will significantly improve the performance of our detection arrays.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YDark Matter Detection§!

children.name: Subspace Sensors
children.description: Sensors that detect the subspace fluctuations left in the wake of traveling starships. Their sensitivity and range is greater than that of a gravitic sensor array.

children.name: Tachyon Sensors
children.description: Advanced sensors that rely on rotating tachyon beams to detect ship movements even at extreme distances.

children.name: Dark Matter Drawing
children.description: This exotic substance has many properties that seemingly defy the laws of physics. Harvestable concentrations can only be found near Black Holes or in certain nebulas.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• has_country_flag=dark_matter_found
• any_system_within_border={any_system_planet={has_resource={type=sr_dark_matteramount>0}}}
• any_relation={AND={is_country_type=defaulthas_communications=ROOThas_technology=tech_mine_dark_matter}}

children.name: Zro Distillation
children.description: An extremely rare aerosol of exotic particles. It has been deposited on a number of worlds through meteor impacts, but its true origin is a mystery. If ingested by psionically-gifted individuals, Zro acts as a very potent (and addictive) drug that enhances Psi abilities.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Speculative Hyperlane Breaching
children.description: Solitary Science Ships can break out of the naturally-occurring hyperlanes and attempt to navigate to known but otherwise unreachable destinations.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Curator Archaeology Lab
children.description: A shipboard lab with advanced archaeological equipment, including a vast database supplied by the Curator Order where new discoveries can easily be cross-referenced.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Curator Exploration Lab
children.description: These shipboard lab facilities incorporate advanced technologies from the ancient Curator Order to further increase survey speeds.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Dyson Swarm
children.description: An array of interlinked satellites, the §YDyson Swarm§! is designed to improve the output of stellar deposits.

children.name: Applied Infinity Thesis
children.description: By making further alterations to reality's rules, we can better monitor its reactions. At this scale, the effects are still difficult to predict, and could affect the entire galaxy.

children.name: Quantum Innovation Nexus
children.description: This nexus boasts state-of-the-art equipment and an unprecedented staff capacity, ushering in an era where quantum theories are not just explored but harnessed for groundbreaking innovation.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Transcendental Innovation Department
children.description: This building is the apex of scientific advancement and proves this is an era of boundless innovation.

children.name: Synaptic Overclocker
children.description: The Lathe has been designed to preserve its installed Neural Chips, keeping them productive for as long as possible. The overclocker can override these commands, resulting in a higher and faster output, but it comes with an increased failure rate.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• any_owned_planet={is_planet_class=pc_cosmogenesis_world}
• Has £ap_cosmogenesis£ §HCosmogenesis§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Synaptic Validator
children.description: While the primary purpose of the validator's specialized functions is to help formulate infinity theses, it can also be applied to more general aspects of computing.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• any_owned_planet={is_planet_class=pc_cosmogenesis_world}
• Has £ap_cosmogenesis£ §HCosmogenesis§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Synaptic Resonator
children.description: Resonators harness and redirect the cognitive potential of stray thoughts and autonomic systems, leading every single chip to increase the efficiency of its closest processing neighbors.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• any_owned_planet={is_planet_class=pc_cosmogenesis_world}
• Has £ap_cosmogenesis£ §HCosmogenesis§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Cetana's Thought
children.description: This compendium, a gift from Cetana, is a tapestry of profound insights, elegantly composed and dense with meaning. It offers more than knowledge; it challenges and reshapes our understanding of technology, society, and the fabric of consciousness itself.

children.name: Gravitational Analysis
children.description: Increasingly powerful computation paradigms allow us to adapt individual construction projects to planetary and ultra-local gravitational conditions.

children.name: High-Energy Capacitors
children.description: Capacitors capable of storing vast amounts of energy is one of the cornerstones for any modern civilization.

children.name: Field Modulation
children.description: Modulated fields allow for increased production and improved energy yield.

children.name: Quantum Energy States
children.description: Basic entanglement principles applied to energy generation provide a substantial increase in energy output.

children.name: Quantum Field Manipulation
children.description: Quantum superposition of energy coils, simultaneously drained and charged.

children.name: Applied Superconductivity
children.description: Minor improvements to transmission efficiency adds up to a sizeable reduction in overall energy loss.

children.name: Global Energy Management
children.description: Load-balancing facilities can greatly improve the stability of local grids and feed excess power back into centralized capacitors.

children.name: Planetary Power Grid
children.description: A re-engineered and unified grid further reduces energy losses over distance.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• Has Technology: §YExotic Gas Extraction§!
• Has Technology: §YExotic Gas Refining§!
• has_country_flag=has_market_access

children.name: Deflectors
children.description: Energy deflector screens can stop a limited amount of incoming enemy fire before overloading. Their main drawback is that they consume large amounts of power.

children.name: Improved Deflectors
children.description: These updated deflector screens are capable of soaking up even more punishment before they overload.

children.name: Basic Cloaking Fields
children.description: A modified particle field allows our vessels to effectively 'hide' in open space. However, this comes at the cost of destabilizing other forms of energy shielding which would otherwise protect the ship.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YBasic Cloaking Fields§!

children.name: Advanced Cloaking Fields
children.description: Advancements in rare crystal lensing technology have greatly improved cloaking efficiency.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YAdvanced Cloaking Fields§!

children.name: Elite Cloaking Fields
children.description: Typical cloaking technology can play havoc with a ship's more delicate instruments. However, these elite fields render such concerns obsolete.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YElite Cloaking Fields§!

children.name: Dark Matter Cloaking Fields
children.description: This device uses dark matter to warp space-time around the vessel, making it incredibly difficult to detect.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YDark Matter Cloaking Fields§!

children.name: Shields
children.description: These new shield generators represent the next generation of energy screens, replacing the older deflector technology. They offer significantly better protection.

children.name: Shield Capacitors
children.description: These capacitors store surplus energy which can quickly be transferred to reinforce a ship's shields.

children.name: Shield Hardening
children.description: With these modifications, the fields generated by our shield emitters will partially deflect attacks that would otherwise bypass the shields.

children.name: Advanced Shield Hardening
children.description: Zro particles raised to a high energy state add fluctuations to our shields that can deflect certain weapons that would otherwise easily penetrate the fields.

children.name: Advanced Shields
children.description: An updated shield generator that produces an even stronger energy field. Only sustained enemy fire can penetrate this barrier.

children.name: Hyper Shields
children.description: These reinforced and hardened energy shields are incredibly powerful. The protection they offer is second to none.

children.name: Dark Matter Deflectors
children.description: These deflectors utilize dark matter to deflect incoming projectiles in a way that seems to utterly defy the laws of nature.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• is_country_type=fallen_empire
• is_country_type=awakened_fallen_empire

children.name: Shield Harmonics
children.description: The basic mechanics of ship shields are complex, but they can be adjusted and improved in a multitude of ways.

children.name: Planetary Shields
children.description: Generating a strong energy shield within a planetary atmosphere is a greater challenge than in the vacuum of space, but it offers a potent defense against orbital bombardment.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YPlanetary Shields§!

• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_expertise_field_manipulation£ §cExpertise: Field Manipulation §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_curator£ §cCurator §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_spark_of_genius£ §cSpark of Genius §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2£ §cSpark of Genius 2§!

children.name: Entropic Recursion
children.description: The universe tends irresistibly onwards and downwards. That tendency cannot be reversed... but it can be subverted, for a price.

children.name: Shrinkspace Depot
children.description: The depot influences a portion of subspace where the distance between molecules is reduced, effectively shrinking anything stored there. Living beings are forbidden from entering it.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Extra-Dimensional Depot
children.description: By creating a localized pocket dimension, we can hold nearly endless resources.

children.name: Red Lasers
children.description: Laser weapons fire focused beams of light at targets, causing damage through the generation of intense heat.

children.name: Blue Lasers
children.description: More powerful than red lasers, these blue variants emit electromagnetic radiation at a wavelength that appears blue or violet to most organics.

children.name: UV Lasers
children.description: Ultraviolet lasers are an updated and more powerful version of their blue predecessors. Accurate and destructive, these weapons are capable of inflicting great damage.

children.name: X-Ray Lasers
children.description: These lasers have a shorter wavelength than UV-based laser weaponry, but are even more destructive.

children.name: Proton Launchers
children.description: These energy projectiles consist of tightly concentrated protons capable of causing immense damage to the hull of enemy ships.
weight_modifiers: ×0.5 Does NOT have Technology: §YRed Lasers§!

children.name: Neutron Launchers
children.description: Upgraded energy projectiles that rely on neutrons instead of protons for their destructive power.

children.name: Gamma Lasers
children.description: The electromagnetic radiation emitted by gamma lasers is of an extremely high frequency. Their destructive potential is unmatched in the field of laser weapons.

children.name: Particle Lances
children.description: These heavy energy weapons fire focused particle beams that cause massive damage. The size of the emitter arrays limits their use to battleships and titans.

children.name: Tachyon Lances
children.description: A more powerful version of the particle lance, this weapon fires a tachyon beam of immense power. Like its predecessor, its use is limited to battleships and titans.

children.name: Focusing Arrays
children.description: Perfecting the firing cadence of laser weaponry is a task that could keep the engineering elite of any given planet busy for centuries.

children.name: Disruptors
children.description: Disruptors fire high-energy bolts that weaken and destroy the molecular bonds that hold the target's constituent atoms together. They are capable of passing through shields and armor to wreak havoc directly on enemy hull and crew.
weight_modifiers: ×0.5 Does NOT have Technology: §YRed Lasers§!

children.name: Ion Disruptors
children.description: These upgraded disruptors fire bolts of more destructive ion particles at targets.

children.name: Phase Disruptors
children.description: Extremely high-yield disruptors that fire quantum energy charges causing incredible damage to those unfortunate enough to get in their way.

children.name: Arc Emitters
children.description: Powerful weapons that launch a lightning arc of chaotic energy at targets, which in part can ignore armor and shields.

children.name: Focused Arc Emitters
children.description: These upgraded emitters are equipped with better focusing lenses, resulting in a more powerful energy discharge.

children.name: Plasma Throwers
children.description: Weapons that eject destructive balls of high-energy plasma at targets. These plasma projectiles are extremely effective at eating through ship armor.
weight_modifiers: ×0.5 Does NOT have Technology: §YRed Lasers§!

children.name: Plasma Accelerators
children.description: These new accelerators launch projectiles of high-energy plasma with improved containment fields. This results in less energy leakage as the projectile travels in space towards its target.

children.name: Plasma Cannons
children.description: The latest in plasma weaponry, these cannons are fully militarized versions of the older, somewhat improvised plasma throwers. Their plasma projectiles are even deadlier.

children.name: Flash Coolant
children.description: New developments in tech cooling regularly surface, improving the stability and efficiency of our weapons systems, keeping them from blowing up the ships upon which they are mounted.

children.name: Fission Power
children.description: This energy source generates power for ships through induced fission, but it also produces harmful nuclear waste.

children.name: Fusion Power
children.description: Nuclear fusion processes generate a great amount of power for ships, but without many of the risks associated with fission power.

children.name: Cold Fusion Power
children.description: The ability to sustain a fusion reaction at relatively low temperatures will result in a new generation of fusion reactors for our ships.

children.name: Antimatter Power
children.description: By harnessing the energy produced by matter/antimatter annihilations, our efficiency at generating ship power will be orders of magnitude better than fusion.

children.name: Zero Point Power
children.description: These generators extract vacuum energy, providing an almost limitless supply of ship power. There is no more efficient way to generate energy.

children.name: Jump Drive
children.description: A groundbreaking technological marvel, the Jump Drive shreds the local space-time continuum and rearranges it on the quantum level to be identical to that of the target destination - and thus the ship appears to near-instantly "jump" from system to system.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

×2.0 £default_federation£ Federation :
• Has §YScientific Inspiration§! Federation Perk
• Any member :
• Has Technology: §YJump Drive§!

×0.1 All must be false
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_expertise_particles£ §cExpertise: Particles §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_curator£ §cCurator §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_spark_of_genius£ §cSpark of Genius §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_spark_of_genius_2£ §cSpark of Genius 2§!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_maniacal£ §cHyper Focus §!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_maniacal_2£ §cHyper Focus 2§!
• Councilor has trait : £leader_trait_maniacal_3£ §cHyper Focus 3§!
×1.5 Has £ap_grasp_the_void£ §HGrasp the Void§! Ascension Perk

• Has £civic_eager_explorers£ §YEager Explorers§! Civic
• Has £civic_privatized_exploration£ §YPrivatized Exploration§! Civic
• Has £civic_hive_stargazers£ §YStargazers§! Civic
• Has £civic_machine_exploration_protocol£ §YExploration Protocols§! Civic

children.name: Dark Matter Power
children.description: These generators appear to somehow draw energy directly from dark matter, providing more ship power than should be possible according to the laws of physics.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• is_country_type=fallen_empire
• is_country_type=awakened_fallen_empire

children.name: Reactor Boosters
children.description: Additional power generation systems increase the ship's reactor output.

children.name: Improved Reactor Boosters
children.description: The discovery of fusion power allows for better reactor boosters to be fitted onto our ships.

children.name: Advanced Reactor Boosters
children.description: The discovery of antimatter power allows for highly advanced reactor boosters that can greatly enhance ship reactors.

children.name: Hyperspace Travel
children.description: Like the strands of a spider web, the extra-dimensional realm of hyperspace runs between the gravity wells of most stars. Faster than light travel is theoretically possible along these hyperlanes.

children.name: Hyperlane Breach Points
children.description: We have identified the existence of points in space where a ship expends less energy to "breach" their way into a hyperlane. This will lead to a new generation of hyper drives.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_grasp_the_void£ §HGrasp the Void§! Ascension Perk

×5.0 One must be true
• Has £civic_eager_explorers£ §YEager Explorers§! Civic

• Has £civic_hive_stargazers£ §YStargazers§! Civic
• Has £civic_machine_exploration_protocol£ §YExploration Protocols§! Civic

children.name: Hyper Relays
children.description: §YHyper Relays§! form a chain of structures built outside the gravity well of systems, allowing fast travel from relay to relay rather than requiring transit to established hyperlane entrances.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Hyperspace Slipstreams
children.description: A new generation of hyper drives capable of accessing the subspace slipstreams that are present within hyperspace. This leads to dramatically improved drive performance.

children.name: Gateway Activation
children.description: The ability to reactivate the derelict Gateway stations that can be found scattered throughout the galaxy has the potential to dramatically shorten travel times.

children.name: Wormhole Stabilization
children.description: A naturally occurring subspace wormhole is a fickle thing, and its fluctuating energy levels typically make it impossible to travel safely between its linked apertures. There are ways to temporarily stabilize its matrix, however.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

children.name: FTL Inhibition
children.description: Gravity well projectors can be used to create localized pockets of space where safe entry into hyperspace is impossible. The immense power requirements and the size of the projectors prohibits their use on anything smaller than a starbase.

children.name: Mote Stabilization
children.description: Volatile Motes are fickle particles that are dangerous to work with. In order to safely harvest them without setting off a chain-reaction of explosions, energy fields must be used to stabilize the motes.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• any_owned_planet={OR={has_deposit=d_dust_cavernshas_deposit=d_dust_deserthas_deposit=d_industrial_sector}}

children.name: Astral Harvesting
children.description: The harvesting of torn astral fabric along the scars of rifts in space and time is made possible with delicate modifications to our research stations.
weight_modifiers:
×0.0 All must be false
• has_country_flag=astral_threads_found
• any_system_within_border={OR={exists=astral_riftany_system_planet={has_resource={type=astral_threadsamount>0}}}}

children.name: Volatile Material Plants
children.description: Aside from the obvious safety concerns, the artificial creation of Volatile Motes is an extremely delicate and complicated process that requires highly specialized equipment.

children.name: Quantum Catapult
children.description: A §YQuantum Catapult§! harnesses the power of a Neutron Star or Pulsar to twist the fabric of space, skipping a fleet across great distances.

children.name: Class-3 Singularity
children.description: Capturing the entire energy output from this singularity is an engineering marvel.
weight_modifiers: ×1.5 Has £ap_technological_ascendancy£ §HTechnological Ascendancy§! Ascension Perk

children.name: Class-4 Singularity
children.description: This singularity's power output challenges the laws of physics, yet the containment fields hold with unwavering stability.
